title: Team Pandemic is recruiting
body:
Hello, im beginning to make a new team. Currently looking to fill all role except support. Any rank is welcome because this is a fresh team. Must have a discord with a mic. I will host tryout by playing normals with you and see how well you play and how well you communicate. You can also get a feel for how i play as well. Once things get going we will begin practice and once we get team chemistry we will begin competing. Must be active in league.


IGN:
Role:
Age:
Rank:
Top five champs:
can you shot call:
Strengths:
Weaknesses: 

Thank you for reading

replies.body:
IGN: Ferrum Sinistra
Role: ADC
Age: 15
Rank: P2
Top Five Champs: Caitlyn, Miss Fortune, Ashe, Lucian, Vayne
Can you Shotcall: Yes
Strength: Knowing my boundaries, knowing and applying game knowledge, communication
Weaknesses: Sometimes over greedy
I have a couple questions so if you could add me and answer them that would be great!

BUMP

contact me about open positions still looking

IGN: ^
Role: Top/JG ( pref top )
Age: 21
Rank: G1+ ( new acc ) 
Top Five Champs: Riven, Trundle, Olaf, Dr. Mundo, Jax ( Riven otp ) 
Can You ShotCcall: Yes
Strengths: Patient/Know matchups/Game knowledge/Lane/Extremely vocal
Weaknesses: Not taking the game srs enough ( Do when i play with people )
